caption: The video narrates the interaction between a man and a woman where during the woman’s laundry time, the man assists her with the washing and brings her apples. He also joins her during exercise routines. Over time, the woman grows accustomed to the man’s presence and begins to smile more, signaling a deepening of their friendship. They spend time sitting on the roof together, enjoying the view, and at one point, the woman provides the man with an address. When the man goes in search of this location, he finds that it leads to a house that has been demolished. This discovery leaves him puzzled and troubled.
